Name: Source Notes
Median Incomes: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey 1-Year Estimates, Table S1903 (2005-2019); retrieved from https://data.census.gov/.

Name: Notes
Median Incomes:
Dollar amounts for all years adjusted to 2019 dollars using the average Consumer Price Index Research Series Using Current Methods (CPI-U-RS) for all urban consumers, all goods, for New York-Northern New Jersey-Long Island, NY-NJ-CT-PA. CPI; retrieved from http://www.bls.gov/data/.

Some of the median incomes reported by the Census have been "top-coded" into the highest standard deviation category. For years 2009 and later, the topcoded amount for household income was $250,000 (in current year dollars). Prior to 2009, the topcoded amount was $200,000 (in current year dollars). Due to adjustment for inflation, some incomes displayed for prior years may exceed that year's topcoded amount.
